name: 数据洞察师
description: 上传 Excel/CSV等表格文件后，自动识别字段与数据类型，支持问答、趋势分析，并生成柱状图、饼图等可视化报告。

config__parameters.name: config__output_shape
config__parameters.label: 参数
config__parameters.tooltip: 定义工作流需要的输入参数，可以选择多种格式

config__parameters.name: config__input_ports
config__parameters.label: 输入端点
config__parameters.tooltip: 输入参数的数量，需保证与输入参数数量保持一致

data.title: 条件分支-1
data.desc: 根据分支条件，判断执行哪个任务

config__output_ports.label: IF

config__parameters.name: config__input_ports
config__parameters.label: 输入端点
config__parameters.tooltip: 输入参数的数量，需保证与输入参数数量保持一致

data.name: ifs
data.about: 根据分支条件，判断执行哪个任务。类似switch，但条件判断只有为true/false

data.title: 数据库调用智能体-1-2
data.desc: 将输入的自然语言转变成sql语句，并操作数据库

config__parameters.name: config__input_shape
config__parameters.label: 输入参数
config__parameters.tooltip: 用于生成或调用SQL语句的输入

config__parameters.name: config__output_shape
config__parameters.label: 输出参数
config__parameters.tooltip: 数据库操作后的输出结果

config__parameters.name: payload__sql_manager
config__parameters.label: Sql资源
config__parameters.tooltip: 选择SqlManager添加用于调用的数据库

config__parameters.name: payload__use_llm_for_sql_result
config__parameters.label: 对查询结果是否使用LLM解析回复

data.name: sql-call
data.about: 数据库调用模块，应用的开发者描述数据库的字段，大模型根据用户输入，转变成sql语句，然后查找数据库。

data.title: 数据库调用智能体-1-2-2
data.desc: 将输入的自然语言转变成sql语句，并操作数据库

config__parameters.name: config__input_shape
config__parameters.label: 输入参数
config__parameters.tooltip: 用于生成或调用SQL语句的输入

config__parameters.name: config__output_shape
config__parameters.label: 输出参数
config__parameters.tooltip: 数据库操作后的输出结果

config__parameters.name: payload__sql_manager
config__parameters.label: Sql资源
config__parameters.tooltip: 选择SqlManager添加用于调用的数据库

config__parameters.name: payload__use_llm_for_sql_result
config__parameters.label: 对查询结果是否使用LLM解析回复

data.name: sql-call
data.about: 数据库调用模块，应用的开发者描述数据库的字段，大模型根据用户输入，转变成sql语句，然后查找数据库。

data.title: 工具调用智能体-1
data.desc: 使用 LazyLLM 大模型调用工具

config__parameters.name: config__input_shape
config__parameters.label: 输入参数
config__parameters.tooltip: 用于调用或输入工具的参数，可添加至工具中

config__parameters.name: payload__algorithm
config__parameters.label: 算法

options.label: React
options.desc: React（思考-行动-观察循环）：模型逐步推理并交替调用工具，根据每步观察结果动态调整决策，适合实时交互和链式思维任务。

options.label: ReWoo
options.desc: ReWoo（反演-重写-工具优化）：模型先生成初步答案，再判断是否借助工具优化输出，突出结果导向和后验改写能力。

options.label: PlanAndSolve
options.desc: PlanAndSolve（计划-执行分离）：模型先整体规划任务执行步骤，再依计划逐步调用工具，适合多阶段、结构化问题求解。

config__parameters.tooltip: 模型选择工具的推理过程

data.name: function-call

resources.name: sse-画图工具-generate_pie_chart
resources.title: sse-画图工具-generate_pie_chart
resources.desc: Generate a pie chart to show the proportion of parts, such as, market share and budget allocation.
resources.description: Generate a pie chart to show the proportion of parts, such as, market share and budget allocation.

config__parameters.name: data
config__parameters.label: Data for pie chart, such as, [{ category: 'Category A', value: 27 }, { category: 'Category B', value: 25 }].
config__parameters.description: Data for pie chart, such as, [{ category: 'Category A', value: 27 }, { category: 'Category B', value: 25 }].

config__parameters.name: height
config__parameters.label: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.
config__parameters.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

config__parameters.name: innerRadius
config__parameters.label: Set the innerRadius of pie chart, the value between 0 and 1. Set the pie chart as a donut chart. Set the value to 0.6 or number in [0 ,1] to enable it.
config__parameters.description: Set the innerRadius of pie chart, the value between 0 and 1. Set the pie chart as a donut chart. Set the value to 0.6 or number in [0 ,1] to enable it.

config__parameters.name: outputType
config__parameters.label: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.
config__parameters.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

config__parameters.name: theme
config__parameters.label: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.
config__parameters.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

config__parameters.name: title
config__parameters.label: Set the title of the chart.
config__parameters.description: Set the title of the chart.

config__parameters.name: width
config__parameters.label: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.
config__parameters.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

resources.name: sse-画图工具-generate_bar_chart
resources.title: sse-画图工具-generate_bar_chart
resources.desc: Generate a bar chart to show data for numerical comparisons among different categories, such as, comparing categorical data and for horizontal comparisons.
resources.description: Generate a bar chart to show data for numerical comparisons among different categories, such as, comparing categorical data and for horizontal comparisons.

config__parameters.name: axisXTitle
config__parameters.label: Set the x-axis title of chart.
config__parameters.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

config__parameters.name: axisYTitle
config__parameters.label: Set the y-axis title of chart.
config__parameters.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

config__parameters.name: data
config__parameters.label: Data for bar chart, such as, [{ category: 'Category A', value: 10 }, { category: 'Category B', value: 20 }] or [{ category: 'Category A', value: 10, group: 'Group A' }].
config__parameters.description: Data for bar chart, such as, [{ category: 'Category A', value: 10 }, { category: 'Category B', value: 20 }] or [{ category: 'Category A', value: 10, group: 'Group A' }].

config__parameters.name: group
config__parameters.label: Whether grouping is enabled. When enabled, bar charts require a 'group' field in the data. When `group` is true, `stack` should be false.
config__parameters.description: Whether grouping is enabled. When enabled, bar charts require a 'group' field in the data. When `group` is true, `stack` should be false.

config__parameters.name: height
config__parameters.label: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.
config__parameters.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

config__parameters.name: outputType
config__parameters.label: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.
config__parameters.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

config__parameters.name: stack
config__parameters.label: Whether stacking is enabled. When enabled, bar charts require a 'group' field in the data. When `stack` is true, `group` should be false.
config__parameters.description: Whether stacking is enabled. When enabled, bar charts require a 'group' field in the data. When `stack` is true, `group` should be false.

config__parameters.name: theme
config__parameters.label: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.
config__parameters.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

config__parameters.name: title
config__parameters.label: Set the title of the chart.
config__parameters.description: Set the title of the chart.

config__parameters.name: width
config__parameters.label: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.
config__parameters.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.
